Name: Express Simulator
About the game: This is a challenging leisure strategy game. Players have to go to different places to get express delivery, and send them to different destinations to get the corresponding reward. Players need to get the required reward in a limited time, which requires players to plan the route and time reasonably, so as to get more reward in a shorter time.
Meta Title: Express Simulator: Jun 18, 2021, Yang Sun and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Express Simulator? Check out the release date (Jun 18, 2021), developer insights from Yang Sun, and a complete game summary.
